headline: In a Tale of Tigers, L.S.U.’s Group Writes the Perfect Ending
abstract: A win in Monday’s title game erased any remaining doubts that Ed Orgeron’s team had arrived as a dominant force in the sport.
lead_paragraph: NEW ORLEANS — Louisiana State, which opened the college football season as an underdog in its own division, won the national championship on Monday night behind a vigorous offense, outlasting Clemson, last year’s title winner.
